alert.note: Alert for Emanuel; Johnson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 5:31PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Emanuel and southeastern Johnson Counties through 600 PM EST... At 530 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was over Adrian, or 11 miles north of Soperton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Swainsboro, Twin City, Adrian, Garfield, Nunez, Norristown Junction, Norristown and George L Smith State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for east central Georgia.
